categories.name: 前置要求
categories.description: 必需的基础模组和依赖项

categories.name: 界面优化
categories.description: 改善游戏界面和用户体验的模组

categories.name: 游戏玩法
categories.description: 修改游戏核心机制、战斗系统、等级进展等内容的模组

categories.name: 外观定制
categories.description: 修改角色、装备、环境等视觉外观的模组

categories.name: 装备物品
categories.description: 添加或修改武器、防具、道具等装备的模组

categories.name: 骰子系统
categories.description: 修改游戏骰子机制和概率系统的模组

categories.name: 平衡调整
categories.description: 调整游戏平衡性、难度和数值的模组

categories.name: 职业扩展
categories.description: 添加或修改职业、子职业和专长的模组

categories.name: 属性修改
categories.description: 修改游戏属性、状态和效果的模组

mods.name: Tav's Hair Salon
mods.description: A mod adding a large variety of hairstyles for different body types and races, enhancing customization options.

mods.name: Variant of Orin's Hair
mods.description: A mod introducing variations of Orin's iconic hairstyle, including options without accessories.

mods.name: Everybody Dyes Unlimited Dyeing
mods.description: This mod makes dye usage unlimited, allowing players to customize their armor colors freely.

mods.name: Shirts Dresses Corsets
mods.description: A mod that adds a variety of fashionable clothing options for camp wear.

mods.name: New Character Creation Presets
mods.description: A mod adding improved and new face presets to enhance character creation.

mods.name: Eldritch Knight Plus
mods.description: Rebalances the Eldritch Knight subclass by modifying spell progression, enhancing passives, and ensuring a balanced playstyle without relying heavily on multiclassing.

mods.name: Artificer Class Rebalance
mods.description: Introduces the Artificer class with balanced crafting mechanics and spell progression, maintaining harmony within Baldur's Gate 3.

mods.name: Party Limit Rebalance
mods.description: Increases the party size limit to six, ensuring a balanced gameplay experience without overpowering the group.

mods.name: Carry Weight Adjustment
mods.description: Modifies encumbrance mechanics to offer a fairer balance for looting and exploration without breaking game difficulty.

mods.name: Mystic Class
mods.description: Introduces the Mystic class from Unearthed Arcana, featuring psionic talents, disciplines, and subclasses tailored for Baldur's Gate 3.

mods.name: Artificer Class
mods.description: Adds the Artificer class, including all four subclasses with support for crafting and utility-focused gameplay.

mods.name: Pactbound - A Warlock Overhaul
mods.description: Rebalances the Warlock class by enhancing invocations, adding new passives, and diversifying playstyles.

mods.name: Druid 2024
mods.description: Updates the Druid class to align with the 2024 PHB changes, including Circle of the Sea and other subclasses.

mods.name: College of Dance - Bard Subclass
mods.description: Introduces a new Bard subclass, College of Dance, focused on movement and crowd control abilities.

mods.name: Dice Set Expansion
mods.description: Expands the existing dice selection with 14 new standalone skins, offering a variety of colors and designs to enhance the dice-rolling experience.

mods.name: REWard's Dice Emporium
mods.description: Offers a collection of uniquely designed dice, including themes like Sparkle Dice and Lady Pastel, allowing players to personalize their dice-rolling visuals.

mods.name: Peculiar Dices Collection
mods.description: A collection of uniquely designed dice with 3D effects, offering a distinctive aesthetic for dice rolls.

mods.name: Custom Dice
mods.description: Provides 18 new d20 variants with various colors and designs, allowing players to personalize their dice-rolling experience.

mods.name: Mystral Magic - Full Dice Set
mods.description: A set of 12 recolors of the original Mystral Magic dice skin, themed around the Weave, providing vibrant colors and glowing numbers.

mods.name: Transmog
mods.description: Allows you to retain the appearance of any equipment while using the stats of a different piece, providing maximum customization without sacrificing power.

mods.name: All Items
mods.description: Adds a container to your camp that includes all weapons, armor, and equipment from the game for immediate use.

mods.name: Bags Bags Bags
mods.description: Adds additional inventory management options with specialized containers for various item types, helping declutter your inventory.

mods.name: Gold Zero Weight
mods.description: Reduces the carry weight of gold to zero, allowing players to focus on adventure without being encumbered by wealth.

mods.name: Noble Trickster's Garments
mods.description: Adds a stylish armor set with unique stats and customization options, including exclusive dyes.

mods.name: 5e Spells
mods.description: Expands the game by adding spells from Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition, including levels 1-6, and introduces unique effects from Tasha's Cauldron of Everything.

mods.name: Party Size Begone
mods.description: Allows players to expand their party size from 4 to 8 members, enhancing team-based strategies.

mods.name: Fantastical Multiverse
mods.description: Adds a variety of playable races from different universes, enriching character customization and world exploration.

mods.name: Lone Wolf
mods.description: Optimized for solo adventurers, this mod increases XP rates and raises the level cap to 20, supporting solo gameplay styles.

mods.name: Trials of Tav - a roguelike mode
mods.description: Transforms the game into a roguelike experience with 38 maps, progressive difficulty, and randomized loot.

mods.name: Hide as a Bonus Action
mods.description: Restores the 'Hide' mechanic to a bonus action, making stealth more dynamic and fluid during combat.

mods.name: Varied AC and Dex Modifiers
mods.description: Introduces mechanics from D&D 3rd Edition, diversifying armor class and dexterity interactions.

mods.name: Fast XP
mods.description: Provides accelerated leveling options with double XP modes for early or entire campaigns.

mods.name: BG3 Mod Manager
mods.description: Official mod management tool for BG3

mods.name: Script Extender
mods.description: Extends scripting capabilities for BG3

mods.name: Improved UI
mods.description: Enhanced user interface modifications

mods.name: Full Release Mod Fixer
mods.description: Fixes compatibility issues for mods

mods.name: Achievement Enabler
mods.description: Enables achievements while using mods

mods.name: No Intro
mods.description: Removes the intro videos, allowing players to start the game faster.

mods.name: Customizer's Compendium
mods.description: Adds new customization options to the character creation screen, such as additional hairstyles and visual features.

mods.name: Pavelk's UI Improvements
mods.description: A modular mod allowing players to tweak different UI elements, including inventory and sidebar design.

mods.name: Vivid Landscapes UI Addon
mods.description: Enhances the visual style of the UI to match the high-definition textures added by the Vivid Landscapes mod.

mods.name: Enhanced Nude Bodies
mods.description: Modifies body proportions for female characters, including buttocks, thighs, and overall body shape.

mod_features.feature: Offers multiple variations of Orin's hairstyle.
Unlimited dye usage for all armor.
Introduces elegant dresses, shirts, and corsets.
Allows players to enhance their character's style in camp.
Improves spell list and cantrip options.
Adds new passives like Battlemage Casting and Empowered Cantrips.
Balances power scaling across all acts.
Adds Artificer class with four subclasses.
Increases party size to six for strategic depth.
Supports progression up to level 20 with psionic disciplines.
Includes custom icons and tooltips for abilities.
Extensive versatility for role-playing and combat.
Includes Alchemist, Armorer, Artillerist, and Battle Smith subclasses.
Custom icons and tools for enhanced gameplay.
Enhances Eldritch Invocations for broader utility.
Includes custom spells like Moonlight Step.
Unique abilities for mobility and battlefield control.
Includes both released and unreleased designs.
Enhances the visual appeal of dice rolls.
Preserves equipment stats with different appearances.
Works with base and modded equipment.
Provides access to all in-game items from the start.
Great for testing and creative builds.
Adds categorized bags for inventory items.
Introduces a new armor set with unique bonuses.
Introduces races from Etharis, Eorzea, and Krynn.
Boosts XP rates for solo players.
Reverts Hide to a bonus action.
Balances stealth mechanics with other abilities.
Double XP for early levels or full campaigns.

Facilitates organizing mods, allows for easy importing and exporting of mod load orders, automatic recognition of game files, and improves overall mod management. Users can also enable or disable mods as needed.
